issue.title: [Release][Dev] 02-source.sh/03-binary-submit.sh didn't work for 10.0.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18118](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18118). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Wrong variable names are used
- Missing variable definitions
- Requiring multiple environment variables for GitHub Personal Access Token

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18118?focusedCommentId=17625937) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14468
